home.title: Welcome to LaTeX CV Builder
home.description: Create professional, beautifully typeset CVs in minutes with our LaTeX-powered CV builder. No LaTeX knowledge required!
home.importText: Already have a CV? You can also import an existing one.

templates.title: Professional Templates
templates.description: Choose from a variety of professionally designed LaTeX templates.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Simple interface to create and edit your CV without knowing LaTeX.

exportOptions.title: Export Options
exportOptions.description: Download your CV as PDF, or export the LaTeX source code.

editor.title: CV Editor
editor.sectionPlaceholder: Select fields for {{section}} will appear here.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
